item.description:
Hi!

Join us to share what you have manifested since the last meetup. If you're just learning how to consciously attract what you want in your life, bring questions and an open mind.

I have found a private space for our upcoming meeting! We will meet from 9:30am-11:00am. Dunkin Donuts is next door if you would like to grab a beverage on the way in.

See you there!

Julie
item.how_to_find_us: Walk in either the front or side door (next to driveway). There will be a sign on the door that is open to enter. The Center is a red house located next door to Dunkin Donuts.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Tuesday Morning Meetup
